text: Hartland Four Corners is an unincorporated village in the town of Hartland, Windsor County, Vermont, United States. The community is located along Vermont Route 12, southwest of White River Junction. Hartland Four Corners has a post office with ZIP code 05049, which opened on July 5, 1854. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Windsor County, Vermont Category:Unincorporated communities in Vermont
title: Hartland Four Corners, Vermont
